Today in Sutherland, surf is rolling in at 6 ft @ 8s NNW with fresh 15 mph NNE winds. Clean conditions at sheltered spots like Melvich and Strathy, making for a fun session. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s WNW, but still good with 15 mph SSE winds. Day after, surf picks up slightly to 4 ft @ 11s WNW, with lighter 12 mph SSW winds. Best: day after.
